content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=34-41, y=-85 to -87)
Complex system of burner mining drills and inserters for coal extraction:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (41.0,-86.0)
- Storage chests at (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between components

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) extracting copper and iron ore
- Storage chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5) moving materials
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing processed plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Large iron mining operation:
- Three burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts moving materials

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Line of furnaces for ore processing:
- Four stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0) heating water
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5) generating power
- Connected pipe network and electrical poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract from empty or non-existent storage
- Verify that the storage chest exists and contains the required items before attempting extraction
- Check inventory levels regularly to ensure sufficient materials are available

### Entity placement and connection errors
- Ensure proper connections between components (pipes, belts, inserters)
- Verify space availability before placing new entities
- Maintain correct orientation and spacing between connected components

### Resource and fuel management
- Keep burner devices supplied with fuel to prevent work stoppage
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent overflow
- Ensure proper fuel distribution to all burner inserters and mining drills

### Power system errors
- Maintain proper fluid connections in the power generation system
- Ensure continuous water supply to boilers
- Monitor steam engine efficiency and connections
